Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I've tried looking for a fix for this but haven't had any luck.

I'm on KSP 1.8 with quite a few mods.

Basically, my AGU will not grab onto an asteroid, and I think that it's due to the fact that it is stuck in "locked" state, whether it is armed or disarmed.

I've tried arming and disarming multiple times, and terminating the ship then cheating a "new" version next to the asteroid. Neither worked...

Has anyone had this problem ? Any idea for a fix ?

Thanks in advance !

 

P.S. : Idk if I'm posting in the right place : this is my second post. Please tell me if I'm doing anything wrong.
Welcome to the forum @Pitcholine16, your issue has been moved to Tech Support, PC, modded.
